title: The K Camp Interview: New Album, Going Viral, Nipsey, Turning Down Love & Hip Hop & More
description:
K Camp's new album FLOAT is out! He sat down with Adam to talk about getting his props, tired of being called "underrated", going viral on Tiktok, his early days finding his sound, having his own label, relationship with Nipsey, bouncing back from dropping out of college, no job to a successful music career!

https://www.instagram.com/kcamp/
https://twitter.com/kcamp
https://www.facebook.com/KCamp427
